scripts.build: shx cat source-files.txt | xargs cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=12288 cspell-tools-cli compile --trie3 -x compound -o . -M Swedish --no-compress && pnpm run gen-checksum
scripts.conditional-build: pnpm run --silent checksum || pnpm run build
scripts.gen-checksum: shx cat source-files.txt source-dependencies.txt | xargs cspell-tools-cli shasum > checksum.txt
scripts.test-sv: hunspell-reader words -n 1000 "src/ooo-swedish-dict-2-42/dictionaries/sv_SE.dic" | shx tail -n 200 | cspell -v -c ./cspell-ext.json --local=sv --languageId=* stdin
scripts.test: pnpm run test-sv && pnpm run test-samples
